author: stsp
msg: On the pin-externals branch, make it possible to commit property mods on
copied-along children. Attemping this lead to a NULL-deref in the commit code.
(do_item_commit): Don't assume that local_abspath is always non-NULL

author: lehmi
msg: PDFBOX-2610: readLine now treats CR+LF as one EOL

author: thelabdude
msg: SOLR-7018: bin/solr stop should stop if there is only one node running or generate an error message prompting the user to be explicit about which of multiple nodes to stop using the -p or -all options

author: gates
msg: HIVE-9359 Export of a large table causes OOM in Metastore and Client
